alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Van Buren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:14PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Van Buren and southern Jefferson Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leando, or 11 miles northwest of Keosauqua, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keosauqua and Birmingham around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stockport and Bentonsport/Vernon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
